text: Achalume niŵali ŵakwajimila achakongwe (ŵalume ni ntwe weŵasa), ligongo lyanti Allah ŵachimbichisye ŵane mwa jamanjao kwapunda ŵane (achalume kwapunda achakongwe), soni ligongo lya chipanje chao chaakuŵa ali nkutola. Sano achimmasyeto ŵambone niŵali ŵakumanya, ŵakuligosa (yilu yao nigosa yipanje yaliŵasa) atamuno achiŵammakwao pali pangali, ligongo lyanti Allah ŵagosile (achimmasyetowo kupitila mwa achiŵammakwao ŵaakwapaga yaakulajila). Sano aŵala (achimmasyeto) ŵankukujogopa kuliikwesya kwao basi mwajamukani, (naga ngaakupikana) mwawunduchilani pagona, (naga kuunduka ngakukamuchisya) mwaputani (kwangaulasya), sano naga ali nkumpikanila, basi ngasimwasosela matala (gakwalagachisya). Chisimu Allah ni jwaali Jwapenani kusyene, Jwankulungwa nnope
